TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyboardEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.param: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。
Docs.summary: 表示将处理键盘相关路由事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的没有现有键盘事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>委托。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>作为其事件数据类的基类。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> 用作更具体的基类<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>事件数据类。 通过使用这些事件数据类<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>委托，而这些委托使用的现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]如事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
